alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Forsyth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 04 at 9:33AM EST until February 05 at 1:26AM EST by NWS Atlanta
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Georgia... Etowah River near Dawsonville affecting Dawson and Forsyth Counties. For the Etowah River Basin...including Landrum, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Dawsonville, Free Home, Barrettsville, Ball Ground, Northeast Canton, East Canton Downstream I-575, Canton, Waleska, Woodstock, Big Shanty/Kennesaw, Blackwells, Woodstock, Kennesaw, Mars Hill, Below Allatoona Dam, Rockmart, Cartersville, Dallas, Kingston, Kingston, Rome GA 1 Loop, Rome Coosa Valley FG... Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL JUST AFTER MIDNIGHT TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding will continue. * WHERE...Etowah River near Dawsonville. * WHEN...Until just after midnight tonight. * IMPACTS...At 14 feet, Moderate flooding begins in northwest Forsyth county. Old Federal Road begins to flood and Nicholson Road is closed off to residents. Minor flooding continues in south Dawson county. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 8:00 AM EST Friday the stage was 13.9 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 14.1 feet this afternoon. It will then fall below flood stage this evening. - Flood stage is 13 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at weather.gov/atlanta.
